interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2013/11/19
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Dan Scanlon'], 'Producers': ['Kori Rae'], 'Starring': ['Billy Crystal', 'John Goodman', 'Steve Buscemi'], 'Studio': ['Pixar']}
Review Text: It was good, not as good as the first Monsters Inc., movie, but good.  The movie is entirely placed when the monsters were in school.  The quality is awesome and it's worth watching, but be prepared for an understated plot.  I would like to have seen more ties to their work after school and getting hired.  This flew by in about a 30 second window in this movie.
Review Title: Not as good as the first one...
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
